section.name: Assertion functions
section.chapter_description: The aim of these functions is to provide tools to test some other functions.

keyword.name: assert_checkerror
keyword.description: Check that an command raises the expected error.

keyword.name: assert_isapprox
keyword.description: Check that computed and expected values are approximately equal.

keyword.name: assert_isequal
keyword.description: Check that computed and expected values are equal.
